name: Trap Shrine / 女装神社 Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Trap Shrine / 女装神社 Original Soundtrack.
This OST has 12 tracks including whole song of the game theme song "Kamisama Mousou Sakurairo" and its karaoke in MP3 and FLAC format.

Track list
00_OP_神様妄想桜色(Whole song)
01_日常01
02_日常02
03_ドタバタ
04_結ばれる時
05_思い出
06_悲しみ
07_神
08_奇跡
09_緊張
10_危険
11_OP_神様妄想桜色(Karaoke Ver.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip
